comments: A nice guy, but made me feel that i am stupid..... A selfstudy class
So not helpful, would ask him questions in his office and he simply says "I can\'t answer that" because he refuses to help you with hw. Why even have office hours? His projects SUCK.

Horrible teacher. Pretty much just copied the book in to a power point and tries to read it to the class. Smart man but very hard to understand and asks questions that are not fully understandable for quizzes and tests. Study the power points as the quizzes are directly related.
Very hard to understand, some of his test and quiz questions are hard to read let alone do. He doesn\'t curve his grades, and many students repeat his course.

I had this Russian professor for my ME 354 and for moonbuggy class. He is knowledgeable and smart, and very friendly. Helped me a lot. He has this accent ..but you get used to it by the end of the second week. His moonbuggy class made my life different and I recommended it to couple of kids. They seem to like it either

had him for fluid mechanics. very smart instructor just a little hard to understand at times because of his accent. study the power point slides cause questions for the quizzes come from there and the tests has exactly what the quizzes had with 1 or 2 problems that you have to work out.

Very smart prof. but shouldn\'t teach. His way of getting the information across is obviously not working. The whole class is failing. Very hard to understand since he\'s originally from Russia. Usually curves the grades, otherwise everybody would fail
